api.name: getPopularSubgraphs
api.description: Get popular subgraphs on The Graph including Uniswap, Aave, Compound, ENS, and other protocols. Shows query volume and indexing status.

category.description: Optional: Filter by category (defi, nft, dao, social)

api.name: getGraphNetworkStats
api.description: Get The Graph network statistics including total indexers, curators, delegators, and GRT staked.

api.name: querySubgraph
api.description: Execute a GraphQL query against a specific subgraph. Use for custom data queries on Uniswap pools, Aave positions, etc.

meta.title: The Graph
meta.description: The Graph Protocol for querying blockchain data. Access subgraph data for DeFi protocols.
